refsection.title: Description
refsection.para:
This function starts scanning for analog outputs.
INIT - mdaq_ao_scan_init()
LOAD INIT DATA - mdaq_ao_data_update(), mdaq_ao_data_queue()
START SCAN - mdaq_ao_scan()
UPDATE DATA - mdaq_ao_data_update(), mdaq_ao_data_queue()
STOP SCAN - mdaq_ao_scan_stop()

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: This example generates sine waveform on AO channel 1 and triangle waveform on AO channel 2 for 5 sec. Output signal ferquency is 1 Hz. Functions are called without link_id.

refsection.title: Notes
refsection.para: Is not possible to start scanning if data was not uploaded. Check mdaq_ao_data_update() and mdaq_ao_data_queue() functions.
